author: Nick Daino
description: Fetches upcoming NBA game schedules from PlainTextSports and displays them in Discord embeds.
install_msg: Thanks for installing NBAGames! Use `[p]nba` to see upcoming NBA games. Make sure you have aiohttp and beautifulsoup4 installed: `pip install aiohttp beautifulsoup4`
short: Shows upcoming NBA games from PlainTextSports
